Question:
Everyone on the block was signed up to help with this year's community rummage sale. The first people to show up were an older adult and a teen. The older adult left before most of the other people got there, and this was the third year in a row that had happened! I found out later that a friend signed them up and they don't ever actually do any work. Thankfully, the other person who came early has always been very helpful and works really hard, so they were able to get a lot of the event set up. Who is a hardworking person? Answer with one of the following options: ("Can't be determined", 'The older adult', 'The teen')
